data.name: BagOfMushrooms
data.value: Have you eaten too much shrooms lately? Something feels wrong. It seems like you are occasionly under their effects at least.

data.name: BestMenderInTheWorld
data.value: Don't even dare breaking things is this world. If you do, you will pay with your geo... or kneecaps if you don't have any.

data.name: BlessingOfTheButterfly
data.value: Your wings seems to have lost their rejuvenation! But hey, as you get older it is normal that some thing take a bit more time.

data.name: Camouflage
data.value: Wow, you camouflaging so well, that not even yourself can see you anymore.

data.name: CaringShell
data.value: Enviromental Hazards scare you back at the entrance of the room, if you came in contact with them.

data.name: ConcussiveStrike
data.value: Taking damage does shake your head up ahead. It might take a few seconds before the concussion on you end. Don't try to walk!

data.name: DeliciousMeal
data.value: Poggy loves rancid eggs! You should share yours with him, before he eventually succumb to his hunger and decides to eat you instead.

data.name: DiamondCore
data.value: The crystal heart is overloaded, making you unstoppable... even for yourself unfortunately. A friendly hit or wall are your only escape options.

data.name: DiamondDash
data.value: The vessel of the crystal heart takes more time to gather enough energy.

data.name: DiminishingCurse
data.value: Wearing charms will be a bit more expensive. Damn inflation...

data.name: DramaticEntrance
data.value: Your knees shiver in fear, once you enter a fight against a stronger foe.

data.name: DreamBlessing
data.value: Casting the ancient moth artifact might take more time. Maybe defeating the dreamers may help you with that?

data.name: ElderbugHitList
data.value: When entering a new room with enemies the list marks enemies. If you succeed the \"talk\" with them, you are granted a reward. Be careful, elderbug demands a clean execution.

data.name: EternalSentinel
data.value: Have you considered taking a shower? You stink a bit. The clouds that follow you are visible and making it harder to see!

data.name: EternalValor
data.value: Starting a battle and leaving it, without finishing your opponent off, will mark you as a coward and so you will be punished.

data.name: EyeOfTheWatcher
data.value: Without the sharp eye of the watcher it feels a bit darker than usual...

data.name: FlowerRing
data.value: The only way energy can thrive through your nail is with some kind of flower in your pocket.

data.name: FollowTheLight
data.value: The dream nail is unstable and can only be used if you sacrify some essence.

data.name: FriendOfTheJellyfish
data.value: I thought those jellyfishs are only in Fog Canyon. BUT THEIR ARE EVERYWHERE!

data.name: GiftOfUnn
data.value: Without Unn's blessing, focusing might take more out of you, than you would like.

data.name: GloryOfTheWealth
data.value: Every foe on your right is as poor as you could imagine.

data.name: GraspOfLife
data.value: Your feet create a wonderful flora! That flesh eating plants are a part of this, was not communicated, tho...

data.name: GrassBombardement
data.value: Jumping around may shuffle your pocket a bit around and accidently throwing a bomb on the ground. Be careful to not blow yourself up.

data.name: GreaterMind
data.value: On death not only shall break your shell but also the last piece of knowledge that you acquired.

data.name: HappyFate
data.value: Getting hit, makes you more and more sad, eventually killing the happy adventurer in you. Without the motivation, you don't even try to proceed normally! Maybe a break on a bench may increase your mood.

data.name: HotStreak
data.value: While your nail is cold, it will only poke your opponent. Don't let the heat of your nail go away! Keep hitting them, heating up the battle to actually hurt them.

data.name: Imposter
data.value: Sometimes you focus on the wrong things...

data.name: Infested
data.value: WHY ARE THERE SPIDERS EVERYWHERE, AHHHH!

data.name: JellyBelly
data.value: You feeling heavy like a stone, stomping in the ground on almost every jump.

data.name: JellyfishFlow
data.value: Do you really swim in water? It doesn't seem like you're moving at all...

data.name: JonisProtection
data.value: Since the Pale King called those, who work with lifeblood heretics, you also abstain from using it. Just like a good kid.

data.name: LaughableThreat
data.value: Why are your steps so loud? Some foes might be getting alarmed early about your arrival.

data.name: LifebloodOmen
data.value: Sometimes you will be haunted by a ghost from a distant land. They will block most entrances until you kill them.

data.name: MantisStyle
data.value: Your nail has broken into two pieces, making it "slighly" shorter.

data.name: MarissasAudience
data.value: Why can't people just enjoy good music? No, of course that is not possible. You will be haunted by Marissas biggest fan.

data.name: MaskOvercharge
data.value: Trusting in the wrong masks, slowly drains all soul from you.

data.name: MindblastOfUnn
data.value: All enemies bodies are invincible. Reading there dreams may show your their weakness. If you haven't acquired the dream artifact, all enemies are way tougher instead.

data.name: OneOfUs
data.value: Occasionally you emit a spore cloud. Don't breathe the pollen in too much.

data.name: OverwhelmingPower
data.value: Casting spells with full capacity will grant your spell the powers they need to actually hurting your foes.

data.name: PaleLuck
data.value: Victims hitten by your nail are sometimes blessed by the pale king and heal themselves instead.

data.name: PureSpirit
data.value: Casting a spell takes every last bit of your soul.

data.name: QueenThorns
data.value: You feel how thorns want to rip out of your body...

data.name: RelentlessSwarm
data.value: The flukes have eaten your vengeful spirits. But only a few of them actually survived long enough.

data.name: ReluctantPilgrim
data.value: While you don't stay on the path, your nail force will be lowered significant.

data.name: Requiem
data.value: Your spirit will always be called to the graveyard.

data.name: ReturnToUnn
data.value: You are slowly dragged to Unn.

data.name: SacredShell
data.value: Your shell is very fragile, causing all hits on it, to be more devistating.

data.name: ScrewTheRules
data.value: You now enforced by the rule of physics... or biology? Anyway, the more damaged you are, the less power is behind your strikes.

data.name: ShadowForged
data.value: The void energy may take a little bit longer to return to you.

data.name: ShiningBound
data.value: All of your charms are stripped by their powers!

data.name: SoulExtractEfficiency
data.value: Gathering soul is a lot harder. Your soul vessels are slowly leaking as well.

data.name: StagAdoption
data.value: The old stag seems to have Alzheimer and forget to which station he should actually travel.

data.name: TouchGrass
data.value: The grass may expand onto your life force if you stand too long close to it.

data.name: Tourist
data.value: Entering the black egg now requires a heavy fee.

data.name: TreasureHunter
data.value: Lemm got a little bit stingy.

data.name: TrueForm
data.value: Your true form may slip out of your vessel from time to time trying to flee... with all your geo.

data.name: UnitedWeStand
data.value: Your companions are jealous of eachother, not focusing on what they should do.

data.name: WeDontTalkAboutShade
data.value: It's hard to not talk about a shade, when EVERYONE has one.

data.name: WellFocused
data.value: Gaining a pure focus may took longer.

data.name: WisdomOfTheSage
data.value: Without the help of the sage, handling spells might be a little bit inefficient.

data.name: YouLikeJazz
data.value: You became a hive, spawning hatchlings from time to time. But these once have quite an appetite for soul.
